5.  Sure, Sally says she saw me cheat, but she accuses everyone, and she’s al-
most always wrong, so you should know that she is wrong this time, too.
EXERCISEI
Explain  the  point  of  each  of  the  following  remarks.  Indicate  whether  each
remark involves an ad hominem silencer, dismisser, denier, or none of these.
Then say whether the argument provides an adequate justification for its con-
clusion, and why or why not.
1.  The American Tobacco Company
